DataElement.preferredName: Prostate Cancer Treatment Questionnaire Radiation Therapy From Machine Requires Weeks Of Daily Treatments True False Unsure Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A true, false, or unsure response indicator related to prostate cancer radiation therapy from a machine requires weeks of daily treatments.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Prostate Cancer Treatment Questionnaire Radiation Therapy From Machine Requires Weeks Of Daily Treatments
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process._Predetermined sets of questions used to collect data - clinical data, social status, occupational group, etc. The term is often applied to a self-completed survey instrument._A primary or metastatic malignant tumor involving the prostate gland.  The vast majority are carcinomas._Treatment._Treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation. Radiation therapy is often used as part of curative therapy and occasionally as a component of palliative treatment for cancer. Other uses include total body irradiation prior to transplantation._Used to indicate a specified place or time as a starting point; used to indicate a source, cause, agent, or instrument._No Value Exists_Something that is a necessary condition; something that is obligatory._Any period of seven consecutive days._Occurring or done each day.

A primary or metastatic malignant tumor involving the prostate gland.  The vast majority are carcinomas.

Property.preferredName: Radiation Therapy From Machine Requirement Week Daily Therapeutic Procedure
Property.preferredDefinition: Treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation. Radiation therapy is often used as part of curative therapy and occasionally as a component of palliative treatment for cancer. Other uses include total body irradiation prior to transplantation.:Used to indicate a specified place or time as a starting point; used to indicate a source, cause, agent, or instrument.:No Value Exists:Something that is a necessary condition; something that is obligatory.:Any period of seven consecutive days.:Occurring or done each day.:An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.

Concepts.definition: Treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation. Radiation therapy is often used as part of curative therapy and occasionally as a component of palliative treatment for cancer. Other uses include total body irradiation prior to transplantation.
Used to indicate a specified place or time as a starting point; used to indicate a source, cause, agent, or instrument.
Something that is a necessary condition; something that is obligatory.
Any period of seven consecutive days.
An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.
